name: reapop
description: A React and Redux notifications system

scripts.compile: cd demo && ../node_modules/.bin/webpack --config=./build/webpack.config.js && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -R src/static dist/
scripts.react:14: npm run react:clean && npm i react@0.14 react-dom@0.14 react-addons-test-utils@0.14
scripts.react:15: npm run react:clean && npm i react@15 react-dom@15 react-addons-test-utils@15
scripts.react:16: npm run react:clean && npm i react@16.5.2 react-dom@16
scripts.redux:2: npm run redux:clean && npm i redux@2
scripts.redux:3: npm run redux:clean && npm i redux@3
scripts.redux:4: npm run redux:clean && npm i redux@4
scripts.react-redux:2: npm run react-redux:clean && npm i react-redux@2
scripts.react-redux:3.1: npm run react-redux:clean && npm i react-redux@3.1
scripts.react-redux:4: npm run react-redux:clean && npm i react-redux@4
scripts.react-redux:5: npm run react-redux:clean && npm i react-redux@5.0.6
scripts.test:all: npm run react:14 && npm run redux:2 && npm run react-redux:2 && npm t && npm run react:14 && npm run redux:3 && npm run react-redux:3.1 && npm t && npm run react:15 && npm run redux:3 && npm run react-redux:4 && npm t && npm run react:15 && npm run redux:4 && npm run react-redux:5 && npm t && npm run react:16 && npm run redux:3 && npm run react-redux:5 && npm t && npm run react:16 && npm run redux:4 && npm run react-redux:5 && npm t

author: Louis Barranqueiro
